LanguageData.Miho_Magnifier_Hediff.label: Magnifier
LanguageData.Miho_Magnifier_Hediff.description: Simple binoculars for enhanced long range vision. Simply flip them down and you can look through them.
LanguageData.Miho_TacticalAssist_Hediff.label: Aim-Assist Computer
LanguageData.Miho_TacticalAssist_Hediff.description: This fancy headgear calculates the targets movement and predicts it's next position in real time. A target marker is then placed at the calculated position. The only thing left to do is take aim and fire.
LanguageData.Miho_Glasses_Hediff.label: Glasses
LanguageData.Miho_Glasses_Hediff.description: Glasses to improve your eye-sight. They also make you look like a smart librarian.
LanguageData.Miho_Visor_Hediff.label: Miho Visor
LanguageData.Miho_Visor_Hediff.description: This is a protective visor. And it also looks cool!
LanguageData.Miho_Toxmask_Hediff.label: Miho Gas Mask
LanguageData.Miho_Toxmask_Hediff.description: This gas mask protects against toxic environment. Some may wear it for fashion purpose though.
